channel.title: Comments on: Interviewing Tracy Townsend, Author of THE FALL (Thieves of Fate Trilogy, Book Two)
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Diane Bronson
item.dc:creator: Diane Bronson
item.description: What an in-depth and thought-provoking article! Now, I will have to read The Nine again before my copy of The Fall arrives.
item.content:encoded: What an in-depth and thought-provoking article! Now, I will have to read The Nine again before my copy of The Fall arrives.
